Translations.Text: it est their dreams ut dictate their behavior est they naturally wicked
Perfecit they dictus He factus it totus Instead they est simply disbelievers
Let them produce Hadith hoc si they est truthful
they created nihil? Est they creators
they create caelum terra? Indeed they non habet certainty
they possess treasures tuus Dominus? they in est control
they climb ladder perfecit enables them listen Let their listeners show their proof
He perfecit filia dum vos habuit habet filius
Vos asking them any wage ac they burdened thereby
they know future perfecit it actum
they plotting ac scheming disbelievers' schemes backfire them
they habet alias deus DEUS? DEUS glorified far HABET partners
When they vide masses falling caelum they dictus Piled clouds
Disregard them they meet feria in quae they struck
Ut feria their schemes non protect them nor testimentum they helped
Those transgress suffer retribution hic multus de them non know
Vos steadfastly persevere carrying tuus Dominus command - Vos est noster eyes - glorify praise tuus Dominus when vos get
Alias intra nox glorify Eum apud dawn prout stars fade away
